description.p: TmuxGUI is a modern, native GNOME application that provides a beautiful graphical interface for managing tmux sessions, windows, and terminals. Built with GTK4 and Libadwaita for a seamless GNOME desktop experience.

ul.li: Session Management - Create, rename, and delete tmux sessions with visual indicators for attached sessions
Window Management - Create, rename, close, and reorder windows with drag-and-drop support
Integrated Terminal - Full-featured VTE terminal with automatic tmux attachment
File Browser - VS Code-style file tree with search, favorites, and context menu operations
Theme System - 10 beautiful color schemes including Nord, Dracula, Catppuccin, and more
Native Look - Follows GNOME Human Interface Guidelines with Libadwaita styling

description.p: Perfect for developers and system administrators who want a graphical way to manage their tmux sessions while keeping the power of the terminal.
